result.execSummary:
All charges against Bobby J. Vinson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Bobby J. Vinson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby J. Vinson

records.addlTxt:
02:40 PM  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers. Defendant Bobby J. Vinson not in court.  Attorney Chad Shamali appears on behalf of the DE.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM476/22TR3047/22TR3048. Attorney Shamali advises the Court that the DE is in court right now in Racine County for another matter. ADA Smathers places the agreement on the record. The State will dismiss this case and reissue as no DL on person.

01:44 PM  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  No appearance by the Defendant. Attorney Chad A Shamali appeared on behalf of the defendant.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM476/22TR3047/22TR3048. Attorney Shamali advises the Court that the defendant believed his court hearing was tomorrow and is unable to appear for today's hearing. Attorney Shamali is requesting the matter be set for a plea hearing since the case is resolved. The State searches the DE's license on the DMV data base and it is listed as suspended. The State is requesting a bench warrant be stayed. Due to the defendant's failure to appear the Court authorizes a bench warrant with a $500 cash bond. Warrant is stayed until 8/4/2022 at 2:30 pm, at which time bond will be forfeited if no appearance by the defendant.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on August 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Court is no longer available the morning of 7/13/22 and Atty Shamali is unavailable in the afternoon.  Hearing adj to 8/2/22 at 1:30 pm and confirmed with Atty Shamali.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

02:27 PM   Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Michelle Knapp.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury selection scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am. $500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  sg
and witness list filed by the State
